articles.description:
RT mewny
the rumors were true. 
it doesnt take many big players like this to act as a schelling point for other devs to take a technical narrative seriously. 
i guess we're entering appchain season? i've been pilled on async composability. must open and adjust assumptions.
dYdX: We’re excited to announce that dYdX V4 will be developed as a standalone Cosmos-based blockchain! 🔗🎉
 https://dydx.exchange/blog/dydx-chain
